meanings.sent1: She felt even smugger after winning the game.
meanings.sent2: The cat looked smugger than usual after catching the mouse.
meanings.sent3: The smugger cat thought it was the ruler of the house.
meanings.sent4: His smugger attitude made him seem untouchable.
meanings.sent5: The smugger smile on her face revealed her satisfaction.

meanings.sent1: He was known as the smugger among his friends.
meanings.sent2: The smugger always had a self-satisfied expression.
meanings.sent3: The smugger in the group always had a witty comeback.
meanings.sent4: She saw herself as the smugger in the mirror of her mind.
meanings.sent5: The smugger's arrogance was evident in every word he spoke.
